scripts.setup:configure: zowe uss issue ssh "cd /a/kelda16/native/node/hello-wto && node-gyp configure"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:configure && npm run setup:makefile
scripts.remote:build:wtoexec: zowe uss issue ssh "cd /a/kelda16/native/node/hello-wto && make wtoexec.o && cp wtoexec.o build"
scripts.remote:build:wto: zowe uss issue ssh "cd /a/kelda16/native/node/hello-wto && node-gyp build"
scripts.remote:build: npm run remote:build:wtoexec && npm run remote:build:wto
